tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_incident_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50),
  incident_date TIMESTAMP,
  incident_description TEXT,
  reporter_name VARCHAR(100),
  reporter_contact_info VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE incident_reports (
    incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    incident_date TIMESTAMP,
    incident_description TEXT,
    reported_by VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE iot_devices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    last_connection TIMESTAMP,
    owner_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    reported_by VARCHAR(100),
    reported_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IoTDevices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    last_reported_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentResponsePlan (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    response_team VARCHAR(100),
    response_strategy TEXT,
    planned_completion_at DATE
);

CREATE TABLE incident_reports (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    incident_description TEXT,
    incident_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE device_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_value VARCHAR(255),
    data_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE incident_response (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    response_type VARCHAR(50),
    response_description TEXT,
    response_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE incident_reports (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50),
  incident_description TEXT,
  incident_date TIMESTAMP,
  severity_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE iot_devices (
  device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(100),
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  active BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE incident_categories (
  category_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(50) 
)

CREATE TABLE device_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID,
  log_message TEXT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE incident_response_teams (
  team_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR(100),
  team_lead VARCHAR(100),
  team_email VARCHAR(100)
)
